snippet: Alex Gordon, drafted second over all in 2005, had a breakout 2011 season after a mediocre first four years in the majors, and he agreed to a $37.5 million, four-year deal with Kansas City.
lead_paragraph: Alex Gordon, drafted second over all in 2005, had a breakout 2011 season after a mediocre first four years in the majors, and he agreed to a $37.5 million, four-year deal with Kansas City.

headline.print_headline: Royals’ Gordon, a Bust No Longer, Agrees to an Extension
headline.seo: Gordon Gets Four-Year Extension From Royals
headline.main: Royals’ Gordon, Bust No Longer, Agrees to Extension
